long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that transcribes real-time speech into text, displaying the transcription in a user-friendly interface.

Seamless Integration with Google Meet and Zoom: Effortlessly transcribe real-time speech during Google Meet transcription and Zoom transcription meetings directly from your browser.

Unlimited Transcription: Enjoy unlimited transcription with no restrictions on word count or time duration. Transcribe as much as you need, as often as you need, including Zoom meeting transcription and Google Meet transcripts.

Completely Free: Access all features of the extension for free. No hidden fees, no subscriptions â€“ available globally at no cost, making it the best free text-to-speech Chrome extension.

No Registration or Credit Card Required: Your privacy is our priority. We do not require registration or collect personal information for marketing or data selling.
Download Transcripts: Easily download your transcriptions in Word document format for future reference or sharing.

Language Selection for Downloads: Choose your preferred language when downloading transcriptions! Currently supporting English and Spanish, this feature allows users to select the desired language for their downloadable Word documents, making it easier to share and reference transcriptions in the language of your choice.

Limitations: Currently supports English language transcription only.

Transcript Buddy is a perfect blend for those seeking AI transcription tools to transcribe Zoom meetings, transcribe Google Meet calls, or create automated meeting notes effortlessly.
